title: How do you create a school for the rest of your life?
description:
The first wave of the ed-tech revolution was pretty simple. Take school as you know it, and put that online. But to get people excited about lifelong learning, does that work? If you wanted to build a new platform where people would want to learn, and do so in the longterm, what would that look like? MasterClass, maybe.
On this episode, we're going to consider that question alongside the company's founder and CEO, David Rogier.
